About the Package ================================ Sonic is an open source network operating system based on Linux that runs on switches from multiple vendors and ASICs. SONiC offers a full-suite of network functionality, like BGP and RDMA, that has been production-hardened in the data centers of some of the largest cloud service providers. It offers teams the flexibility to create the network solutions they need while leveraging the collective strength of a large ecosystem and community.
=Setup= * Supports Windows and UNIX Agent. * SSH must be enabled on target Sonic Machine. * The Agent should be able to access the Target Sonic machine.
=Variables= (none)
=Common Input= -SSH Host Provide target SSH hostname or IP Address where you want execute the commands E.g. localhost -SSH Port Provide SSH port number -Username Provide username E.g automic -password Provide username E.g automic -Private key File Specify path to the private key file. Required if password is not provided e.g /home/automic/.ssh/id_rsa.ppk -Passphrase Provide passphrase for the private key. -Strict Host Key Check If Yes, a strict host key check will be performed. -Connection TimeOut Specify connection timeout . Zero means no timeout. -Timeout Specify command timeout in seconds. Zero means no timeout. -Allocate TTy Specify whether if TTY allocation should be done or not. -Options Run using Sudo password. -Sudo password The password for the Sudo command
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.ADD_MEMBER_PORT_TO_VLAN * Action Description: This Action will add member port to existing VLAN.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.ADD_VLAN * Action Description: This action will Add a VLAN on sonic.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_MEMBER_PORT_FROM_VLAN * Action Description: This action will Delete a member port from VLAN on sonic.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_VLAN * Action Description: This action will Delete a VLAN on sonic.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.RUN_SONIC_COMMAND * Action Description: This action will execute a command on target sonic system.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.SHOW_INTERFACES * Action Description: This Action will be used to execute show interfaces command.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.LOAD_CONFIGURATION_FROM_MINIGRAPH_FILE * Action Description: This action will Load Configuration from a given MiniGraph file.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.ACTION.LOAD_MANAGEMENT_CONFIGURATION * Action Description: This action will Load Management Configuration from a given file.
